content: easy chunky ear warmer a crochet pattern by cascadefiberworks all of my socials can be found here please tag me if you don t post i d still love to see your creation--you can message on insta or fb messenger you can sell what you make with the pattern you may not redistribute my pattern in any way if you want to share my pattern please use the ravelry/blog url info ch1 does not count as a stitch you ll need l hook 8mm charisma yarn/weight 5 bulky yarn needle scissors pattern chain 11 1 single_crochet in the back bumps of the chain 10 turn 2 ch1 single_crochet 10 turn 3 ch1 single_crochet 8sc in blo single_crochet 10 repeat row 3 until you finish row 38 39-40 repeat row 2 twice fasten_off leave a tail to sew ends together fold the ends together like interlocking c s see photo sew straight across fasten_off and sew in ends
